CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 17, reads: "...7. Home Supply Company and Coury TV, Crosley-Bendix dealers, combined their booths. Shown here extolling the virtues of their products are representatives, Jack Flansbaum, Jack Indzee, Saul B. Pearlstein, Maurice Linden, F. Linden and Dorothy E. Kelly..."
TitMainTitle: Jack Flansbaum, Jack Indzee, Saul B. Pearlstein, Maurice Linden, F. Linden, and Dorothy E. Kelly, standing in the combined Home Supply Company and Coury TV and Crosley-Bendix booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
